bug_report.Summary: The 'Undo' button is disabled after clicking the 'Save' button
bug_report.STR: 1.Log in under User1B", 2.Select", 3.Edit the information 'User Name' field", 4.Click the 'Save' button, 4.Navigate to the 'Undo' button
bug_report.ACT: The 'Undo' buttons is disabled after clicking the 'Save' button
bug_report.EXP: The 'Undo' buttons is activated after clicking the 'Save' button
